title: ROBOT SHAKESPEARE: How Technology and Creativity Fuel Each Other by PARTY NY
desc:
ROBOT SHAKESPEARE: How Technology and Creativity Fuel Each Other by PARTY NY 
 In this lecture, Jamie Carreiro will explore how the world of creativity is affected by advancements in technology and vice versa. Using robots, dinosaurs, spaceships, lasers, dancers, flowers, food, and movies, he'll show how creativity and technology push against each other to create amazing things.? 
 
 The ticket includes one free drink. Max: 30people.
